org.apache.oodt.cas.catalog.struct.impl.index

Class WorkflowManagerDataSourceIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.catalog.struct.impl.index.WorkflowManagerDataSourceIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Index, QueryService

    public class WorkflowManagerDataSourceIndex
extends Object
implements Index, QueryService
    Version:
    $Revision$

    A queriable index for querying for original cas-workflow instance metadata (not for cas-workflow2)

    Author:
    bfoster

        Description copied from interface: QueryService
        Returns all the TransactionIds that fall under the given query
